articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Coronavirus: A global pandemic?
articles.description: With infections spreading to more countries every day, the effects of the virus appear to be very close to meeting the definition of a pandemic.
articles.content:
Past outbreaks of new viruses have been declared global pandemics, but so far the World Health Organization (WHO) has stopped short of doing that for the coronavirus.
With infections spreading to more countries every day, the effects of the virus appear to b… [+156 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Coronavirus outbreak hits arts and entertainment industries
articles.description: How the coronavirus outbreak is putting the squeeze on Hollywood movies and the arts.
articles.content:
As the coronavirus outbreak expands, the art world is taking a hit.
Many Hollywood movies, fine art exhibitions and musical concerts have been cancelled or delayed.
Al Jazeera's Scott Heidler reports from Bangkok.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: The 10 most common questions on the coronavirus answered
articles.description: We use Google Trends to find out what you want to know about the new coronavirus.
articles.content:
A deadly new coronavirus is spreading across the globe, with at least 48 countries on six continents confirming cases as of Thursday. 
The new virus has infected more than 81,000 people and killed about 2,800 others since it was first detected in the central… [+3488 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Italian regional governor goes into isolation over coronavirus
articles.description: Lombardy's governor, Attilio Fontana, has quarantined himself after a staff member came down with coronavirus.
articles.content:
The governor of the region of Lombardy, at the epicentre of Italy's coronavirus outbreak, has placed himself in quarantine after one of his staff came down with the disease.
Attilio Fontana, who has held repeated news conferences this past week to explain ho… [+3134 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: South Korea struggles to contain coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: South Korea has confirmed 505 fresh cases of coronavirus infection, meaning it has overtaken China in new daily infection numbers.
articles.content:
South Korea has confirmed 505 fresh cases of coronavirus infection, meaning it has overtaken China in new daily infection numbers.
The government has stepped up measures to stop the spread of the virus.
Al Jazeera's Sarah Clark reports.

articles.description: Democrats slam Trump for his response as new coronavirus case in California could be first community transmission in US.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump says US 'very, very ready' for coronavirus: Live updates

articles.title: Is the spread of coronavirus out of control?
articles.description: Increasing numbers of cases are being reported around the world and governments are struggling to contain the disease.
